name: be kind, be true, be you
description: My first creation this year is a reminder to be kind, true, and to just be you. It's the first time in my life starting a fresh year without griefing the year passed, the happiness missed and the despair carried. It's the first time in my life when I enter a new year proud of what I've accomplished and excited to seek out more - more kindness, more truths, and more of you.
